title: Rösti-topped chicken pie With broccoli, mustard and tarragon

ingredients.item: 125g tenderstem broccoli spears, cut into 2.5cm lengths
4 Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets, cut into chunks
½ x 15g pack fresh tarragon, roughly chopped
400g pack Waitrose Swiss Style Rösti, from the grocery section

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190°C, gas mark 5. Plunge the broccoli in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain. Heat the oil in a medium saucepan and cook the onion for 3-4 minutes, until softened and golden.  Stir in the mustard and crème fraîche then bring to a simmer. Add the chicken and stir to separate the pieces. Simmer gently for 5 minutes then add the tarragon and broccoli.  Pour the chicken mixture into a 2-litre serving dish. Remove the rösti from the pack and crumble gently over the top. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden and bubbling. Serve with steamed Chantenay carrots.
